A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The plot runs from disjointed to incoherent and is loaded with overbearing feminist messaging.  Men appear to be testosterone poisoned idiots and previous heroes are trashed or become irrelevant.  People in my row fell asleep. Special effects\, filming and CGI were excellent but the acting and story never really came together.  In the end\, I just wanted the Empire to win and put an end to my misery.
